summary: This document is the Seventh Amended and Restated Master Lease Agreement dated November 14, 2025, between STORE MASTER FUNDING XII, LLC (Lessor) and ASCENT INDUSTRIES CO. (Lessee), amending the prior lease agreement dated June 30, 2025. The lease covers specified properties with an initial term expiring on September 30, 2036, and includes two ten-year extension options, with rental adjustments based on a specified formula starting from October 1, 2026.
